articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg defends Meta's AI spending spree as shares tumble - Financial Times
articles.description: Parent of Facebook and Instagram reports better than expected quarterly revenue but raises capex guidance

articles.author: Aniket Verma
articles.title: Bitcoin mining: Time for miners to shift focus post-halving? - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Transaction fees are emerging as a strong revenue stream for miners with each halving.
articles.content:
• Percentage of miner revenue derived from fees hit an ATH on the halving day.
  • Miners have been selling their holdings post halving after HODLing for more than a month.

articles.author: Abner Li
articles.title: Chrome's deprecation of third-party cookies delayed again - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google originally planned to get rid of third-party cookies in Chrome by 2022. Following two delays, Google announced a third to 2025.
articles.content:
Google originally planned to get rid of third-party cookies in Chrome by 2022. Following two delays, Google yesterday announced a third to 2025.
We remain committed to engaging closely with the CMA … [+1764 chars]
